articles.title: Last Non-NULL Date in SQL Server
articles.description:
The simplest of requests are often the most difficult to execute. For example, a finance team needs to know every time a customer did not invoice for 90 days...
The post Last Non-NULL Date in SQL Server appeared first on SQLServerCentral.
articles.content: The simplest of requests are often the most difficult to execute. For example, a finance team needs to know every time a customer did not invoice for 90 days in the past 2 years. The simplicity of th… [+8903 chars]
